mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.nature_of_the_assets, t.address, t.area, t.the_ownership_of, t.the_ownership_card_number, t.a_mortgagee, t.the_mortgage_amount, t.seizure_of_the_sequence, t.the_first_letter_court, t.relationship, t.valuation, t.estimated_residual_value, t.is_do
